ingredients.text: Coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper
Coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 to 4 lbs of a brisket cut of beef
1 lbs sliced or lean ground beef
2 cups flour, plus more for dusting
1/2 onion, diced and sauteed till transluscent, cooled
2 1/2 pounds center-cut beef tenderloin, tied by your butcher
2 hard-boiled large eggs, chopped into bits

1 cup sour cream, at room temperature
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipes.name: Beef Cheek Confit With Caramelized Turnips

ingredients.text: Diced beef tripe 2 whole beef cheeks
Diced beef tripe 4 c rendered beef fat
4 small turnips trimmed and cut into 1/4″ cubes
Diced beef tripe 1/4 c beef juice from confit
1 pound white mushrooms, sliced 1/2 inch thick
1 Whole Beef Tenderloin (3 ½ to 5 Pounds)
A handful fresh chives, finely chopped
Green hot sauce, such as tabasco
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cut into a 1/2-inch dice (about 4 cups)
1/2 pound fully cooked corned beef (about 1 pound raw, simmered for 3 hours until fork-tender), shredded into 1/2-inch pieces
1 large onion, cut into medium dice (about 1 1/2 cups)
1 poblano chile, cut into medium dice (about 1/2 cup)
2 tablespoons ketchup or chili sauce (for spicier hash)
1 (1-lb) piece beef tenderloin, trimmed, sliced 1/4 inch thick, then cut into 1-inch pieces
3/4 lb cremini mushrooms, trimmed and halved (quartered if large)
3 tablespoons sour cream at room temperature

recipes.name: Ann Seranne's Rib Roast Of Beef

ingredients.text: One 2- to 4-rib roast of beef, weighing 4½ to 12 pounds
1/2 to 1 cup beef stock or broth (optional, if making pan gravy)
1 pound cubed boneless beef stew meat
2 tablespoons tamarind pulp, dissolved in 1/4 cup hot water
